name: Mazellenge
description:
Collect keys and resources. Buy weapons. Defeat powerful bosses. Find the way out from randomly generated maze.

BINDINGS:

> Right mouse button - Move character towards place indicated by cursor.
> Space / Left mouse button - Use base weapon.
> Q - Use special weapon.
> E - Interact with object.
> W - Use health-restoring battery.
> D - Use energy-restoring battery.
